instruction: Please research the companies listed in the MSCI EM Latin America IMI that have exposure to the efficient-energy theme and provide recommendations on which ones to invest in based on their ESG profile and low-carbon-solutions technology.
output: After conducting research, I recommend investing in companies such as ENEL Americas S.A and Natura & Co Holding S.A. These companies have a high exposure to efficient-energy themes and a strong ESG profile, with ENEL Americas S.A. being recognized as a leader in Environmental and Social Governance and Natura & Co Holding S.A. being a leader in corporate responsibility. Investing in these companies aligns with the development of renewable energy and a circular economy, while also reducing carbon emissions.
